content.question: Based on the data in Figure 1, make a claim about the behavioral responses of the male Makira flycatchers to a model of a Makira flycatcher. Use the data to justify your claim. Make a claim about the behavioral responses of the male Makira flycatchers to the song recordings of a Makira flycatcher. Use the data to justify your claim.

frqParts.text: Based on the data in Figure 1, make a claim about the behavioral responses of the male Makira flycatchers to a model of a Makira flycatcher. Use the data to justify your claim. Make a claim about the behavioral responses of the male Makira flycatchers to the song recordings of a Makira flycatcher. Use the data to justify your claim.

skill.text: 6.C: Provide reasoning to justify a claim by connecting evidence to biological theories.
